title: morganas tormented soil lasts too long
body:
Morganas tormented soil lasts way to long no one will sit in it for 5 seconds. It should be shortened to probably 3 seconds to make her less dependant on annoying cc. Its suration can scale by level making morgana chooose between a longer snare or shorter tormented soil.

Its main use is to proc spell effects now and a bit of bonus damage for snared enemies and its duration should be shortened. 

It should do 35 - 40 ap damage per sec. That would decrease the damage a bit but would make it more reliable. This will also reduce her waveclear a bit.

Tormented soil is probably the only lack luster spell in morganas kit and should be buffed. This would make morganas kit perfect imo.
